doc.title: Charlie!
doc.plot: Satirizing the strange preponderance of "Charlies" in the 1970s, a tale which brings together Charlie's Angels, Revlon's Charlie perfume, Charles Manson, and even Charlie the Tuna in this drag queen free-for-all. The story follows three angelic crime-fighting beauties as they infiltrate a cosmetics company on a mission for their mysterious boss, Charlie.
